What are people saying about us?

If you want a mastering engineer to help take your recordings to the next level, Keenan's your guy." - Andrew Nappo

"Keenan’s mastering was brilliant. All of the hours I spent recording and writing my song became totally worth it once I placed it in his hands. I care about my songs a lot, and it quickly became evident that Keenan cared, too." - Matt Bennett

"I had a great time working with Keenan from Get Mastered. He approached my music with an open-minded, collaborative attitude, offering constructive advice and expertise while still working to retain the spirit and vision of what I was trying to make. He's a talented engineer with a solid ear - I would recommend him to anyone!" - Matthew O'Connor

"Keenan was very professional, polite, and informative working with me on my track. He answered my questions and made sure that it came out the way I wanted. Not only did it come out sounding stellar, but I learned a bit about my craft as well. I'll be using him in the future for mastering my work." - Asa Jones

"The mix feedback Keenan gave me was superb. FAQ

What is mastering?

Mastering means a lot of different things to different people. To us, it means making your music sound amazing, together.
Learn more about our take on mastering here

Who are you guys?

We are audio professionals with expertise in various fields of audio, both heavily technical and artistic.
Click here to read more about us.

Can I listen to some examples of your work?

Yes - that's an easy one!
You can do that right here.

I really can't afford your rates right now. Can I still Get Mastered?

Yes! We know that even the most talented artists sometimes can't afford professional mastering, and we think that's a shame. We don't want you to have to resort to lousy, unprofessional mastering services, so we do offer Pro Bono Mastering Services for artists that we consider incredibly unique and talented.

Do you guys offer mixing services? What about stem mastering?

Mixing and stem mastering are much more time intensive than mastering, and because of this, we don't offer them through our website. However, our engineers do help clients with mixing needs on occassion. Our engineers each have their own individual mixing rates when they are available to take on mixing work. The same goes for stem mastering, but both really depend on our workload.

If you are already connected with one of our engineers, reach out to them for more information on rates and availability. If you are not connected with us, send us an email at services@getmastered.com and ask about our availability and rates.
